q1: Who plays in left back for FC. Porto?
q3: The top flights of Portuguese football.
a3: The club supporters are called Portistas. Since 2003, Porto have played their home matches at the Estádio do Dragão, which replaced the previous 52-year-old ground, the Estádio das Antas.
q4: In which city does FC. Porto play in?
a5: Yes, Porto (Oporto in English). 2nd largest city in Portugal.
